properties.displayName: Suspicious Volume Shadow Copy Vsstrace.dll Load
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\vsstrace.dll" and (not(((InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Program Files\\" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\") or ((InitiatingProcessFolderPath in~ ("C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe", "C:\\Windows\\ImmersiveControlPanel\\SystemSettings.exe")) or (InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32\\" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\Temp\\{" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\")))))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the image load of VSS DLL by uncommon executables
